transArray.content: As expected of the Huazhu brand, the team members are all young and their communication is gentle and meticulous. The hotel is relatively new. When I went there, the supervisor was reviewing the room. Every corner and detail was managed very well. The most praiseworthy thing is the comfort of the bedding, which is made of latex and the quilt is very breathableüëç

Dear guests, hello! Thank you for sharing your stay experience with us despite your busy schedule. We are very honored that you spent time in the hotel. Our service, quality and details can be recognized by you, which also makes us feel warm in our hearts. It is our unremitting pursuit to make every guest feel at home. We will continue to work hard and hope to bring you a more warm and comfortable accommodation environment. We look forward to your visit again! Manager: Zhang Lijuan
